question_hi.subject: Rajasthan History
question_hi.question_en: Which Rajasthani king ruled Rajasthan from 1572 to 1603? (Ala Singh)
question_hi.question_hi: राजस्थंटनी राजस्थंटनी राजस्थंटनी के राजस्थंटनी राजस्थंटनी राजस्थंटनी राजस्थंटनी राजस्थंटनी
question_hi.explanation_en: Ala Singh was a Rajput ruler who ruled Rajasthan from 1555 to 1572 and is known for his brave deeds.

question_hi.subject: Rajasthan History
question_hi.question_en: What was the capital of Rajasthan during Mughal rule?
